what: missing configuration options that were in compose charts but not in reporter charts, e.g. Legend, Tooltip, Offset, label rotation for X and Y axis.
why: to provide the same set of features on both chart configurators.

what: function INSTR that can be used in the compose pre-filters, used like INSTR('foobar', 'foo').
It returns the position of the first occurrence of the second parameter in the first, starting with 1.
Returns 0 if no match was found and the matching is case insensitive.
why: to providing more flexibility for the compose pre-filters.

what: disabled the field picker drag and drop while searching for a field when configuring module, chart and page fields.
why: because reordering of fields while searching was causing issues.
how: by adding a computed property that tracks if a query parameter is added and if dragging is disabled.

what: the column selectors in reporter (pre-filter, label/primary/secondary column) now all show the label and name of the column, they can also now be searched except for the presort.
why: to make it easier to differentiate between the different fields that have the same label, for example after using a Join.
how: by replacing the default bootstrap select with the vue-select component.

what: greater than and less than filter operators, they are now only available on number and date fields.
Contains and Not contains filter operators are now only available for multi value fields.
why: to prevent users from using filter operators that are not supported for specific field types.
how: by updating the operators list configuration in the record list filter.

what: filtering for bool type for equal and not equal operator.
how: by adding custom val handler for bool type to convert it properly while parsing the query according to supported drivers.

what: sensitivity level un-delete prompting a not found error due to an invalid HTTP request.
how: by properly handling the different sensitivity level states to call the correct endpoint.

what: RBAC rules not applying when assigning them via workflows when providing the role via the Role type.
The workflow didn't raise any errors, but the saved RBAC rule was invalid (the roleID was set to 0 -- invalid).
how: by updating the automation handler code to check all of the supported types and not just the roleID.
The handler logic was only using the roleID parameter and omitting the others.

what: page list not displaying in busy state while pages are being fetched.
how: by adding a spinner with `Loading` text.

what: resource list not being updated after a new resource was imported.
how: by adding an updating function that re-fetches the list of resources.

what: the chart overflowing the block if a reporter chart was used inside a compose page block and the block had a title.
how: by using the same layout as on regular compose charts.

what: permissions modal title being incorrect if the resource didn't have a title or handle defined.
how: by making sure the resourceID will show in the permissions modal title if no other identifiable information exists.
